name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Standing Committee of the Hangzhou Municipal People's Congress released a video announcing the unanimous approval of a resolution, which triggered collective ridicule from netizens.
One netizen commented: "Without opposition voices, it will only become more and more degenerate"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On August 31, a teacher surnamed Huang from the Institute of Acoustics of the Chinese Academy of Sciences reported in the work group that Yan Yonghong, a nominated academician of the Institute of Acoustics, had been committing adultery with his wife Wang for a long time, and had sex with her many times at Huang's home and in Yan's office, and sent a video of confrontation with Yan. He also said that he was threatened in the office.
Later, the teacher surnamed Huang was kicked out of the group chat, and the institute staff claimed that the above were all rumors.
According to public information, Yan Yonghong, born in March 1967, is a researcher and doctoral supervisor, director of the Key Laboratory of Language Acoustics and Content Understanding of the Chinese Academy of Sciences, and deputy director of the Xinjiang Institute of Physics and Chemistry of the Chinese Academy of Sciences (on a temporary basis). He is a national candidate for the National Important Talent Project. He holds more than 40 invention patents and has published more than 200 academic papers. He is a standing director of the Chinese Acoustical Society, deputy editor-in-chief of "Applied Acoustics", and editorial board member of "Journal of Acoustics" and "Journal of Computer Science & Technology".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 30, Beijing. Tong Runzhong joined three companies two years ago. He was fired for refusing to work overtime on weekends. It took him more than a year to fight five lawsuits against the companies and he won all of them. The companies also changed from being arrogant at the beginning to actively seeking reconciliation. Tong Runzhong said that although the lawsuit took a long time, he was quite satisfied with the result. "I told the judge at the time that this was not a joke. This was a class struggle, a struggle between the proletariat and the bourgeoisie. And I didn't fight for money, I fought for the truth." Many netizens supported Tong Runzhong. However, on August 31, all the rights protection videos released by Tong Runzhong were removed from the shelves. He said: If one of me falls, there will be thousands of me standing up!

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of August 31, in Fangchenggang, Guangxi, a 53-year-old man killed five people and then fled. According to reports, villagers said that the dead were all neighbors, including two elderly people around 70 years old and three children. The suspect's parents had passed away and he was single at an advanced age.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens compared two news reports of intentionally beating others, sparking heated discussions.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Selling everything" enters the practical stage
On September 1, Chongqing Yubei District, Chongqing Medical Science and Technology School left thousands of 80% to 90% new tables and chairs due to relocation. Several workers were commissioned by the school to come to the scene and smashed them all with hammers, and sold them as scrap metal.
The photographer, Mr. Wang, said that they had been sold out, and several trucks were pulled. Many tables and chairs were 80% to 90% new. The school didn't want them anymore, so they were all sold as scrap metal because they moved to a new school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 31, in Linzhou, Henan, a man said his Xiaomi phone exploded and there was no after-sales service. After testing, it was found to be caused by external force. So the man drove a car with a banner and used a loud speaker to shout for rights protection.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Recently, Chaozhou City, Guangdong Province, despite residents' opposition, added road closure facilities to the streets of the old city, making it difficult for people to travel and seriously affecting their lives. Some residents are worried that in the event of a fire or sudden illness, ambulances and fire trucks will not be able to get in.
It is revealed that on August 31, an elderly man died because the ambulance was blocked from entering the old city, resulting in delayed rescue.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 29, Zhang Weiwei said during his visit to Hong Kong that it is not easy for the West to compare with the breadth of Chinese culture. We were not confident in the past. The golden cudgel in "Black Myth: Wukong" beat Western political correctness into a state of shame.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
August 31, Suizhou, Hubei. A woman reported the director and vice director of Suizhou Central Hospital by real name.
The woman said that she worked in the hospital from 1987 to 2021, but the hospital never paid her five insurances and one fund, nor did it sign any labor contract, which prevented her from enjoying retirement benefits.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"The Truman Show"
On August 13, Xinhua Daily Telegraph reported that Xi Jinping conducted an on-site investigation of an elderly man in a rural area. The elderly man said that he spent more than 100,000 yuan on medical treatment.
Xi Jinping asked: "Most of them have been reported?"
The staff member next to him quickly answered: "90% can be reported."
Xi Jinping praised.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 31, the Sunac Rongzeyuan project in Zhengzhou, Henan Province was left unfinished, and the owners were beaten by people sent by the developer when they tried to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: August 31, Guangzhou. A blogger met a 22-year-old girl whose father had passed away, her husband had divorced her, and she had three children. She came to Guangzhou with only 2 yuan in her pocket and hoped to find a job.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 29, 2024, the Xiangyin County Education Bureau issued an announcement stating that because the business scope of Xiangyin County Shengbo Youth Psychological Growth Training School did not comply with regulations, it charged training fees beyond the standard and time period, and provided boarding for students, it decided to revoke its private education and training institution's operating license and it was not allowed to engage in any school activities under the name of the original registered institution.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 30 and 31, the temperature in Chongqing reached 40°, but Tongliang No. 1 Middle School delayed giving students a holiday, prompting students to march and protest inside the school, shouting "Giving holidays is not a crime, and rebellion is justified."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 31, an environmental blogger picked up garbage all the way into Tibet, only to find that garbage trucks dumped the garbage directly on the beach of the Jinsha River. The blogger lamented that if the garbage he picked up was dumped by garbage trucks, what was the point of doing this?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of August 30, at the entrance of the Huizhou Municipal Education Bureau, a group of primary school students and parents protested and shouted "I want a degree"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On September 1, residents of Zhongluotan Town, Guangzhou, protested against the construction of the Guangzhou High Energy Technology Park near the village due to concerns about radiation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Parents in Hangzhou, Zhejiang Province contributed
The fifth graders received a new textbook, "Traditional Chinese Medicine and Health", when they started school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On September 1, Qingdao Licang District Shengde Cardiovascular Hospital was relocated to the Qifeng Road Kindergarten and Qingdao Wenzheng Primary School, triggering protests from parents.
During the period, parents cursed the police for "what else can they do except oppressing the people" and "lackeys of socialist China".
Some people were arrested during the period.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: https://t.co/D95SBWosqa

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Magic News
On August 30, Hengyang Daily reported that a man was found guilty of spreading rumors and received administrative punishment for boasting that he was one of the first people to ride the Hengyang Ferris Wheel.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizens ask for help
My son just entered the third grade this year, and the school arranged a course called "Xi Jinping's New Era Socialist Thought Student Reader".
As a parent, I am very angry and hope to ask netizens for advice:
1. How can family education offset Xi Jinping's brainwashing.
2. What is the universal education of children like?
